title: HSD demand increases by 26%, petrol 14% in Q1 FY 2021-22: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 28 (APP):Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar Thursday said the country’s demand of High Speed Diesel (HSD) and petrol had witnessed an increase of 26 per cent and 14 per cent respectively, during the first quarter of financial year 2021-22.
Similarly, in a tweet, he said electricity consumption had risen by 13 per cent during this calendar year.
He said all these were the signs of a robust economic growth that could be even higher than the last year’s.
